name: La SandWitcherie
description:
"We can fly with our spirit." - Kiki Description

You are a little witch who has recently opened her strange sandwich shop in France.
Customers will ask you to customize their SandWitches with crazy ingredients.
Your mission: to make them happy so you don't close the shop.

How To Play
  • UP /  DOWN / LEFT / RIGHT : 
    • "W/A/S/D".
    • ARROWS.
    • "Z/Q/S/D" (Je ne vous oublie pas les Français ;) ).
  • INTERACT : 
    • SPACE BAR.
  • MUTE THE MUSIC : 
    • PRESS "M".
  • You can use the trashcan in the left corner to reset your ingredients.
Credits
  • Hundraw : 
    • Game Design
    • Programming
    • 2D Artist
    • UI/UX Designer
  • Music : 
    • "On a clear Day" from "Kiki's Delivery Service" by Joe Hisaishi arranged by Hundraw
  • SFX :
    • 54 Interface SFX [FREE] by Junkomory.
Tools
  • GameMaker Studio 2 (Engine).
  • Bosca Ceoil (Music).
  • Aseprite (2D Assets).
  • Autodesk SketchBook (Sketchs and notes).
Weekly Game Jam 196

"La SandWitcherie" was developed only by me (Hundraw), for the Weekly Game Jam 196 with the theme "Strange Recipe", it's the first Game Jam where I didn't give up before the end x), I learned a lot of things with this Jam. 

I'm happy and proud to present you the result.

Enjoy ;) !!
